title: CKS is only available in the UK
description: The NICE Clinical Knowledge Summary (CKS) site is only available to users in the UK, Crown Dependencies and British Overseas Territories
cleaned_text: CKS is only available in the UK The NICE Clinical Knowledge Summaries (CKS) site is only available to users in the UK, Crown Dependencies and British Overseas Territories. CKS content is produced by Clarity Informatics Ltd (trading as Agilio Software | Primary Care). It is available to users outside the UK via subscription from the [Agilio | Prodigy website](https://prodigy.clarity.co.uk/). If you believe you are seeing this page in
